title: BC, the Church of Cleave

replies.body: It's going to be amazing on the new Ashe. Each of the 5 AA in her flurry attack can stack Black Cleaver. Bye bye tanks!
i have yet to try new cleaver but using it on jarvan just sounds amazing
Is shaco any good with new cleaver, I feel his passive slow plus cleaver speed boost is op but idk.
